item.title: jupyter美化
item.description: jupyterthemes 安装jupyter主题 # install jupyterthemes pip install jupyterthemes # upgrade to latest version pip install --upgrade jupyterthemes 使用主题 jt -t monokai -fs 95 -altp -tfs 11 -nfs 115 -cellw 88% -N -T 更多主题设置 jupyterthemes
